mini marum mankollakam sthri dushana kappam siddhi rasakata sambandha pathala kalli nayaka maligawaththa padinchi kadar mohidin mohomad asmin nohoth mamasmige maranaya polis wishesha karya balaka niladharin siya aathma aarakshawe ayithiya udesa sidu karana lada wedi thabimakin sidu wuwak bawata kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath gihan pilapitiya mahatha eeye (09) siddhiya sambandha thinduwa prakasha karamin sadahan kaleya.mamasmige hisa pradeshayata wedi undayak wadimen me maranaya sidu wa athi bawa pawasu mahesthrathwaraya ee sambandhayen adhikaranayata idiripath wu sakki, waidya wartha ha awasthanugatha karunu salaka bala meya aparadhayak bawata karunu heli nowana bawath hudek aathma aarakshawa sadaha sidu karana laddak bawa pawasiya.adhikarana waidya niladhari shriyantha amarasinha mahatha wisin nikuth karanu labu pashchath marana parikshana warthawa ha adhikarana waidya niladhari shashini malawiaarachchi mahathmiyage thuwalakaru wu sarathchandra rajakaruna namaththage adhikarana waidya warthawa parishilanaya karamin me thinduwa laba dun bawata wadiduratath thinduwe sadahan ya.polis wishesha karya balakaye niladharinge athadanguwe sitiya di mamasmige maranaya sidu wa thibuna da eya aparadhayak nowana bawata mahesthrathwaraya thiranaya kota thibina.wimarshana siyalla awasan bawin dabliw pi ke ech 1152 darana difendar jip rathaya polis wishesha karya balakaya wetha muda harimatath nadu bhanda washayen polis barayata gena athi pistholaya polis wishesha karya balakaya wisin nikuth kota athi niladhariyata ohuge ananyathawaya thahawuru kota muda harina lesatath mahesthrathwaraya siya niyogaya magin adhikarana rejistar wetha niyoga kota thibina.
